entry.title: 代码测试
entry.content:
试一下代码的显示效果如何，顺便测一下脑残live2d看板娘话能不能说清楚

<body>    <p title="fibre testing"       id="fibre"       class="big blue"><small>今天</small>天气很好</p>       <span><em>今天</em><i>天气</i><strong>很好</strong></span>       <span><span id="pink">fibre</span><span id="skyblue">很开心</span></span>       <span>8<sub>1</sub></span>       <span>8 <sup>3</sup> </span>       </body>

第二段代码，再测一下

 <style>        p {            height: 1000px;            width: 400px;             background-color: pink            ;        }    </style></head><body>    <p>今天天气很好</p>    <span>fibre很开心</span>    <!-- <a id="three"></a> --></body>
